p:
Regarding the therapeutic potential of the seven potent SARS-CoV-2 3CLpro inhibitors, dose–response curves of ethacrynic acid, naproxen, allopurinol, butenafine hydrochloride, raloxifene hydrochloride, tranylcypromine hydrochloride and saquinavir mesylate are shown in Figure 2, with their IC 50 values and chemical structures. The measured IC 50 values were 1.11 ± 0.11, 3.45 ± 0.49, 3.77 ± 0.62, 5.40 ± 0.78, 5.61 ± 0.23, 8.64 ± 3.17, and 9.92 ± 0.73 µM, respectively. Interestingly, despite the different protease family, saquinavir mesylate, an inhibitor of aspartate proteases
17 , was able to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 3CLpro, a cysteine protease.
